title: How to Make Maple Bacon Breakfast Sandwiches

steps.headline: Add the baking mix, milk, maple-flavored pancake syrup, and butter to a mixing bowl.
Mix till a soft dough forms.
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface.
Knead dough 8 to 10 times.
steps.description: Be gentle as you don't want tough biscuits!

steps.headline: Cook bacon until crisp.
steps.description: Place the cooked bacon on paper towels to drain.

steps.headline: Slice the baked biscuits and add cooked bacon strips.
Top with a slice of American cheese.

text: Preheat oven to 425 °F (218 °C).  Add the baking mix, milk, maple-flavored pancake syrup, and butter to a mixing bowl.  Mix till a soft dough forms.  Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface.  Knead dough 8 to 10 times. Be gentle as you don't want tough biscuits! Bake biscuits 10 to 12 minutes.  Cook bacon until crisp. Place the cooked bacon on paper towels to drain. Slice the baked biscuits and add cooked bacon strips.  Top with a slice of American cheese.  Serve.
